top.title: At least 153 dead after reported strike on school, Iran says
top.summary: Iran has blamed the US and Israel for the strike; the US is looking into reports of the incident, while the IDF says it is "not aware" of operations in the area.

top.title: Nine dead in missile attack on Israel as Iran strikes region
top.summary: Several deaths are reported across the Middle East as Tehran retaliates for massive strikes by the US and Israel.

top.title: Deadly Texas bar shooting is 'potentially an act of terrorism', FBI says
top.summary: Two people were killed and 14 injured, with the suspected gunman also shot dead on the scene.

top.title: Trump orders government to stop using Anthropic in battle over AI use
top.summary: The move announced on social media comes after a standoff between Anthropic's boss and the US Department of Defense.

top.title: Resident Evil Requiem's director on redefining the survival horror genre
top.summary: Director Koshi Nakanishi says balancing action and horror within the game has been a huge challenge.

top.title: Could a huge data centre revitalise Ayrshire - or ruin it?
top.summary: Controversial proposals to turn land near HMP Kilmarnock into a technology hub are being advanced by energy company ILI Group.

title.#text: Kalshi voids some bets on Khamenei’s ouster because it’s ‘directly tied to death’
Lego’s Smart Brick is here, and it transforms these new Star Wars sets
Soundcore’s Space 2 are an evolution of its budget headphones
